articles.title: Breakthrough Brings Scientists Closer to Creating Heaviest Element Ever - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In a feat of modern-day alchemy, scientists have used a beam of vaporized titanium to create one of the heaviest elements on Earth – and they think this new method could pave the way to even heftier horizons.

articles.author: Jijo Malayil
articles.title: Flying robot uses beetle’s unique mechanism for takeoff, mid-air stability - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Inspired by beetles, researchers developed a microrobot with passive wing deployment, mimicking beetle flight for stable, controlled motion.
articles.content: The study revealed that beetles use elastic energy and flapping forces to passively deploy hindwings for flight and retract them using the elytra (modified, hardened forewing of beetles) rather than … [+727 chars]

articles.title: Indian Astronomers Discover 34 New Enormous Cosmic Radio Sources - NDTV
articles.description: The GMRT, located near Pune, India, played a crucial role in this discovery. This powerful telescope surveyed the radio sky at a low frequency, making it ideal for detecting these faint, distant objects.
